LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO20_INTRO_6: {SAY:zombossicon}无论如何 - 龙尸齐心, 其利断金!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO20_INTRO_7: {SAY:zombossicon}立刻交出你所珍爱的脑子, 否则就痛苦地死去吧! 谨启, 僵尸博士
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO20_INTRO_8: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}这里已经四面龙歌了! 我们能赢吗?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO20_OUTRO_1: {START_DIALOG_MUSIC}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:winnie}我们又一次在恐龙危机中获胜了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO20_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}僵尸博士已经撤退到未来科技的保护中了. 我们应该立刻追上它.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO20_OUTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}你觉得那里会不会已经有一个未来的我了?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO20_OUTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}但愿不要如此. 我们不需要在这里出现悖论.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO20_OUTRO_5: {EXCITED:crazydave}你只是不想同时对付两个疯狂戴夫吧?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}我看到了一块化石, 它好大!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_DINO_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_2: {SAY:winnie}这个猛禽的爪子是开启一个古老恐龙竞技场的钥匙, 戴夫!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT1_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}哇哦! 现在是4000年前... 的晚上!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT1_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}是的, 戴夫. 夜间的沙漠或许会变得宁静祥和...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT1_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}但是木乃伊僵尸还是会来, 还是想要脑子.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT1_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}是时候开始夜间作战了! 带好我们的小喷菇和阳光菇!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT3_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}它们会时不时冒出来, 挡住我们.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT3_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}确实. 免得僵尸趁虚而入.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT4_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}看啊, 潘妮! 这些僵尸正在造小金字塔!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT4_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}它们应该不是在干那种事, 戴夫.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT4_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}不过, 看起来它们确实在谋划什么和金字塔有关的事.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT4_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}你应当尽量在他们进攻之前好好准备.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT4_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}确实, 邻居! 今天他们不会来得那么快了!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT7_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}特殊的墓碑已经部署, 一点也不喜的惊喜藏于其中.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT7_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}请上交你的脑子, 或者说你更希望我的墓碑摧毁你的防线并且用暴力手段抢走它?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT7_INTRO_6: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}如果我们没有及时拆除这些墓碑, 它们会十分致命.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT7_INTRO_7: {SAY:winnie}但是, 它们每一个里面都塞着一个巨人, 所以, 也别那么莽撞.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT7_INTRO_8: {SAY:crazydave}卧了个大槽! 不要有压力, 邻居, 但是快一点!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT9_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}有的时候传送带会停止供应某种植物.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT9_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}所以且用且珍惜吧 - 有些植物是限量的.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT10_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}确实. 仪器数据显示一场探险家僵尸冲锋即将到来.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT10_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}幸运的是, 地刺可以防止这些花被踩坏, 这是个特性, 戴夫, 特性.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT10_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}我们应该在冲锋之前及时种好地刺.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT10_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}不要忘了你还有坚果, 邻居! 它们很硬!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT10_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}确实, 戴夫. 沙漠终于变得安静祥和了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_NIGHT10_OUTRO_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}那么是时候继续打主线了, 邻居! 做得好 !
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT1_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}那闻起来不太对. 僵尸博士在哪?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT1_INTRO_4: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}与此同时... 让我们种植物.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT1_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}我们现在是有土豆雷了? 还是说没有?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT1_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}这些问题或许都可以推到时空悖论上? 真是让人费解...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT1_OUTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}现在我们不用太担心这件事.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT3_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY}今天我们不需要阳光. 因为我们有传送带.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT4_INTRO_2: {SAY}呃, 邻居, 你能帮忙保护它们吗?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT4_INTRO_3: {SAY}不在上面种植就可以, 它们会茁壮生长的!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT5_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}现在僵尸可以组织大型进攻, 可能有3旗或者更多.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT5_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}它们也获得了一些更危险的能力.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT5_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}有的时候, 把输出植物放在后面是个好主意.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT5_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}这样僵尸就很难威胁到它们了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT6_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}: 戴夫, 我们遇到了一点问题.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT6_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}国际植物组织出现了植物短缺的问题.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT6_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}为了贯彻节约节俭, 你不能在草坪上种太多植物.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT6_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}... 这个组织是什么时候成立的?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT6_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}... 9年前? 植物大战僵尸一代什么时候出的?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT6_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}看起来僵尸可以利用沙尘暴快速穿过我们的防线.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT6_OUTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}仪器数据显示, 冰冻, 眩晕或者击退可以立刻停止沙尘暴.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT7_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY}你们好啊, 时空穿越者们,
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT7_INTRO_2: {SAY}我已经派专人去拿走你的大脑.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT7_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}请在它们到来之前在合同上签字.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT7_INTRO_5: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}酷, 僵尸博士想要我的签名!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT7_INTRO_7: {SAY:winnie}或许我们需要足够的向日葵去应对僵尸大军.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT7_INTRO_8: {SAY:winnie}两排大概就够了, 如果需要的话, 可以种更多.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT7_INTRO_9: {SAY:winnie}你可以通过我设计的一个小挑战来练习.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT8_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}一定要利用好你所有的植物.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT8_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}如果你觉得时机不对, 你可以把植物暂时储存在传送带中.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT9_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:winnie}否则, 或许你会摧毁现实.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT9_INTRO_4: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{EXCITED:crazydave}别这样, 邻居! 那样你会有大麻烦!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT10_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Sometimes you'll need to tread lightly around the zombie hordes.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT10_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Try to wait until you have a good enough defense instead of attacking the zombies right away.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT10_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Potato Mines and Icebergs are excellent for that, and you'll get more plants like these later on.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT10_INTRO_4: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Look Penny, I spot some yellow and black paint!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT10_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}... oh. Right. I forgot about the endangered plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT10_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}Take action, and save them from being eaten.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT10_INTRO_7: {SAY:crazydave}After all, we can't deny the S.O.S call on the banana phone!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT10_OUTRO_2: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SPECIAL8}哈, 那只是一个裹着纸筒的僵尸!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT10_OUTRO_4: {TIRED:winnie}戴夫一直在找机会讲这个笑话.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT10_OUTRO_5: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}你知道什么比裹着纸筒更好吗? 那就是置身时空乱流中. 我们走!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT0_INTRO_3: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}僵尸会掉落叶绿素, 维生素和矿物质含量是牛肉的十倍.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT0_INTRO_4: {PLAYFUL:winnie}这是早餐的必要成分. 拖到植物上来使用它.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT0_INTRO_5: {PLAYFUL:winnie}然后, 植物的特殊能力将被激活.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT0_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}但是, 为了防止时间冲突, 我们首先得先找到叶绿素.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT0_INTRO_7: {SAY:winnie}所以说, 我们过不去这里?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT0_INTRO_8: {SAY:winnie}或许你应该去其它时代去寻找叶绿素.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT11_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}啊, 又是这帮木乃伊! 打不完的木乃伊!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT11_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}时空裂隙强化了每个时代的僵尸, 戴夫.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT11_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}我们将会遇到一些僵尸的强化形态.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT11_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}反正我还什么都没遇到! 一起摇滚吧!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT14_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}草坪上全都是石头! 真烦人!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT14_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}看起来又是一个坚不可摧关卡. 你觉得你能搞定吗?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT14_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}我的邻居肯定能! 不过是一些死神僵尸...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT14_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}... 和一些水晶骷髅头僵尸! 这有什么难对付的?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT16_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}从现在开始, 关卡都会变得更长.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT16_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}你应该提升自己耐力来应对.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT16_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}一些高费植物是很好用的 - 你也可以带一些控制类植物争取时间.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT16_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}是的! 一味的莽可以让你走得很快...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT16_INTRO_6: {SAY:crazydave}在和僵尸的拉锯战中要更加谨慎!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT16_INTRO_7: {SAY:crazydave}不过僵尸们只会拖着腐烂的脚慢慢挪, 所以也不用过于担心!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT19_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}小心, 戴夫! 今天的阳光很毒!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT19_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}噢. 生命中总是充满了不公!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT19_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}至少你不用拖着腐烂的脚慢慢挪.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT20_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}欢迎, 古老的园丁, 另一个死亡陷阱已经静候多时.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT20_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}你认为只有黑暗时代的亡灵会返乡?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT20_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}准备好对付我的巨人大军... 它们已经来了!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT20_INTRO_6: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}别那么紧张! 我们已经赢过他一次了...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT20_INTRO_7: {SAY:crazydave}当然, 我们有把握再赢一次!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT20_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}{SAY:winnie}那是最后一个木乃伊了. 真正的最后.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT20_OUTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}仪器数据显示, 我们的下一个目标是失落之城.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT20_OUTRO_4: {EXCITED:crazydave}好吧, 虽然那些神庙可能很快又会被僵尸占领! 我们走, 潘妮!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT00_INTRO_2: {TIRED:winnie}这看起来是另一道大门, 戴夫.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT00_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}我们需要有4个叶绿素槽才能通过这里.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT00_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}或许我们需要先到其它时代去寻找这一项强化.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT21_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我们又回到了这片沙漠, 戴夫.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT21_INTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}没时间闲聊了! 僵尸们都迫不及待了!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT21_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}不要慌, 戴夫. 看起来僵尸博士已经亮出了他最后的底牌.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT21_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}所有植物的冷却时间都变成了原来的1.5倍.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT21_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}从现在开始, 我们或许需要重新考虑制胜策略.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT21_INTRO_6: {SAY:crazydave}没有什么可以阻止我们这位专业的园丁!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT23_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}僵尸博士调高了温度, 戴夫.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT23_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}冰系植物面对僵尸大军已经没那么有效了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT23_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}糟糕! 我的太阳镜呢! 我的芦荟呢!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT25_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}今日天气预报: 干燥, 局部有重甲巨人僵尸.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT25_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}仪器数据显示, 屏幕外有一些阳光.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT25_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}或许我们可以利用太阳神僵尸把它们吸进来.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT25_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}我觉得我们会得到意料之外的结局.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT26_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}国际植物组织给了我们一个全新挑战.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT26_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}现在, 我们需要在一段时间内不消耗阳光来取胜.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT26_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}所以现在连阳光资源都需要保护?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT26_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}保护植物, 保护霉菌, 保护阳光资源...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT26_INTRO_7: {SAY:winnie}技术上来说, 你不用保护你m... 当我没说.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT27_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}这些僵尸真是越来越没耐心了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT27_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}我们本来和它们说好要来一场坚不可摧... 但是他们不太守信.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT27_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}但是我们的植物还是受到了影响, 它们的冷却时间更长了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT27_INTRO_8: {SAY:crazydave}没事, 不就是冷却变慢吗, 咱什么场面没见过?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT29_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}我似乎跟你说过, 你不要再选植物了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT29_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}所以为什么... 我们现在需要用这些玩意打僵尸?我选的明明不是这些啊...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT29_INTRO_8: {SAY:winnie}我会扩大植物黑名单, 保持一百年. 而且我从此以后会每天检查植物两次.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT29_INTRO_9: {SAY:crazydave}哦. 被抓现行了... 我觉得远这些植物很有趣!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT29_INTRO_10: {SAY:winnie}又不是你打僵尸, 你当然会觉得有趣.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT30_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}欢迎回来, 时间旅行者们.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT30_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}是时候去认真地将你击败了, 我准备了一支加强版死神僵尸大军.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT30_INTRO_4: {SAY:zombossicon}起来吧, 我的臣民! 吃掉他们的脑子, 宣告我们的胜利!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT30_INTRO_5: {SAY:zombossicon}从此以后, 再也不会有植物妨碍我统治所有时间线!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT30_INTRO_7: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}看起来他要把他手下的心腹大臣派出来了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT30_INTRO_9: {SAY:winnie}在处理墓碑方面, 不要出任何问题, 否则一切就都完了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT30_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}{SAY:winnie}那是最后一个木乃伊僵尸了. 真的真的最后一个了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT30_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}我希望我不要再说一次这句话了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT30_OUTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}看起来僵尸博士逃回失落之城去召集军队了.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT30_OUTRO_4: {EXCITED:crazydave}回到那个充满秘密的丛林! 我们上, 潘妮!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:winnie}尽管四面体是金字塔的形状, 却不是正多面体.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EGYPT_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_2: {EXCITED:crazydave}我好饿. 我想吃蒸剁面皮.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES1_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}Flashback! I remember this decor from when I chased squirbos as a kid!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES1_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Indeed, User Dave. We appear to have arrived in the midst of a Neon Mixtape Tour.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES1_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}I suspect the musical tempo may affect the zombies' speeds.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES1_INTRO_4: {EXCITED:crazydave}I'm feeding the rhythm, I'M FEEDING THE RHYTHM!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES2_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}I believe 特点 zombies may display unique abilities while their preferred music is playing.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES2_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}You mean they'll jam their jam when their jam is jamming?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES2_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}Yes, correct, yes, and yes, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES5_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}We have encountered Boombox僵尸, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES5_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}They can stun all plants with their charming music for a while.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES5_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Moreover, they can rise from the ground to stun our defenses right away.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES5_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}Measures should be taken, should that happen.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES5_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}It's gonna be music to my ears... and our plants'!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES6_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}Do you feel that you have grooved? Did you bang your head? Have you dug it?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES6_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}Now the party is over! Melt before the musical might of my majestic Hair Metal Gargantuar!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES6_INTRO_5: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}I'm scared, Penny! It's two minutes to midnight!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES6_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}Be brave, User Dave. We'll jilt this ditty... on rock and roll!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES8_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Say Penny, why do we repeat everything we said when we visit certain levels again?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES8_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}These are their own 'dimensions', I would say.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES8_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}When you visit one, you are starting from the beginning of that dimension.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES8_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}Thus time has to flow, affecting everything in here, including us.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES8_INTRO_6: {SAY:crazydave}Is that a made-up, cheesy, unscientific explanation?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES10_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}They jam their jams, but their jams aren't their jams anymore!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES10_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}Whah? So you mean that the jams to jam to aren't the same anymore?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES10_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}{SAY:crazydave}All that time traveling and still no Mr. Boss guy!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES10_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Patience, User Dave. I have detected an unusual energy spike in Ancient Egypt.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES10_OUTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}I believe zombies have regrouped there and become stronger for another push.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES10_OUTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}It's time we stepped up our game with this newly acquired source of Plant Food.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES10_OUTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}Plant Food, eh? No plant will go hungry anymore! I like the idea already!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES11_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The final era. I suspect that Dr. Zomboss kept a trick up his sleeves.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES11_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}I fear that we will need to weather some of the toughest zombie hordes.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES11_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}So long as we're in the groove, we'll be a-ok!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES12_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Last time we had to work blindly due to the jamming condition.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES12_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}Can we assume that this is to be taken literally?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES12_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}Don't get blindsided by their dancing prowess, though.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES13_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Hey Penny! I found this arcade machine thingie!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES13_INTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}Do you think that you can make it work again?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES13_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}There's no time for games, User Dave. There's another horde coming in.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES13_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}Aw. But gaming can give me the experience to beat them!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES13_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}Not now, User Dave. We have to act fast.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES13_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}We're not the only one who can use the power of 8-bit technology, after all.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES15_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Along with the microphone swing, it seems that we have a new spinning threat.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES15_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Breakdancers will prove to be a huge threat with... whatever they do with their moves.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES15_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}Who needs to breakdance with their head...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES15_INTRO_4: {特点2:crazydave}WHEN YOU HAVE A POT ON YOUR HEAD INSTEAD???
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES15_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}Your logic still makes no sense as always, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES17_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}One era ago I said I wanted to see Football僵尸 again...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES17_INTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}And now he's here! Time to get my Hypno-shrooms again!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES17_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}There's always time to watch football after all! Even when you're in your own childhood!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES17_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}Be careful with what you wish for, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES17_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}No time to be careful - let's go!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES18_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Welcome, Partying Travellers, to the first of my last traps!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES18_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}I have taken nearly all your plants this time!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES18_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}Take them back from me... if you dare!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES18_INTRO_4: {SAY:zombossicon}For my challenge will surely make you stumble! Sincerely, Dr. Edgar Zomboss
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES18_INTRO_5: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}All the sun producing plants... and NEARLY all our offensive plants!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES18_INTRO_7: {SAY:winnie}Not all hope is lost, User Dave. Surely we can find a way.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES19_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Greetings, Gardeners. It seemed that my last trap didn't quite work out.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES19_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}Thus a new scheme was born - now, my zombie army will be fueled by the power of the jams!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES19_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}... and the power of arcade machines as well.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES19_INTRO_4: {SAY:zombossicon}But enough details - attack! Signed, Dr. Edgar Zomboss
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES19_INTRO_5: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}All those arcade machines... imagine when the 8-bit jam shows up!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES19_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}I fear there's more to this than just the shuffling of the 8-bit army.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES20_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Well, Gardeners. It seems that you're rather persistent and resilient.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES20_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}One of my strongest hordes will now be sent out to dispatch you.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES20_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}The stage is set; my zombies are ready. Surrender your brain - there will be no other way!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES20_INTRO_5: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{特点2:crazydave}Time to TAKE BACK THE STAGE!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES20_INTRO_7: {SAY:crazydave}I can't help it, Penny! We're finally meeting Mr. Boss guy again!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES20_OUTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}It seemed like all my schemes and plans have fallen apart, thanks to you.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES20_OUTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}But even in defeat, there's still hope for me - for I have one last ditch effort to stop you.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES20_OUTRO_4: {SAY:zombossicon}I shall now gracefully retreat into the timelines again.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES20_OUTRO_5: {SAY:zombossicon}Mark my word: You haven't won the war. You have only won the battle.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES20_OUTRO_9: {SAY:winnie}We can't wallow in misery now, User Dave. We must prepare for when Zomboss comes back.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES20_OUTRO_10: {TIRED:crazydave}But... all this time... no Mr. Boss guy... what's the point of this trip, then?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES20_OUTRO_11: {TIRED:winnie}It seems to me that Zomboss is hiding something...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES20_OUTRO_13: {NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}*robotic sigh* Here we go again on the road.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES20_OUTRO_14: {SAY:winnie}You'd think that he would have learned not to charge in after so many battles...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EIGHTIES_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY: {SAY:crazydave}Karaoke time! At last my tangerine dreams will come true!
{SAY:winnie}Caution, User Dave. This dropped mic promises a banned battle of heavy petal proportions!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_PLANTPUZZLE_1_INTRO_: {SAY:winnie}You only have a small number of plants and some Escape Roots.
{SAY:winnie}Move the plants around with Escape Roots and defeat the zombies.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_PLANTPUZZLE_2_INTRO_: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}In some arenas you may get to use additional chosen plants.
{SAY:winnie}All given plants will have no packet recharge.
{SAY:winnie}However, you have limited sun, so use them wisely.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_PLANTPUZZLE_8_OUTRO_: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Well done. You have successfully finished all 8 arenas.
{SAY:winnie}I hope this has been a fun training experience for you.
{SAY:winnie}It's time we went back to the time stream.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BOWLING_1_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Hey there neighbor! We're going on a fun trip today!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BOWLING_1_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}With our new bulbs... This is gonna be even better!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BOWLING_2_INTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}There will be more rounds later on.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BOWLING_2_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}With new twists and turns for every timeline!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BOWLING_8_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}You have come a long way here.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BOWLING_8_INTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}But can you handle even more tricks?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BOWLING_8_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}Protect those Wall-nuts, with our bulbs and Wall-nuts!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BOWLING_9_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Now we have a lovely flower line to mark where you can place your bulbs!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BOWLING_9_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}She's not up for talking for now. She's busy with her oily stuff.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BOWLING_10_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}This is it. The end of the road.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BOWLING_10_INTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}The last of the zombies to bowl over.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BOWLING_10_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}Some says if you rush hard enough at some point... you get some other plant?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BOWLING_10_OUTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}I have never seen so many Strikes before!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BOWLING_10_OUTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}That was fun, ain't it? To let some stuff out with bowling.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BOWLING_10_OUTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}But we need to get back to finding Mr. Boss guy now.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_1_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}We'll need to learn more about our plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_1_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}That'll help us in the long run when we're up against the zombies.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_1_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}Sour and tangy... yet, he packs quite a punch!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_1_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}Surely he'll be a great guy to bond with! Let's do this!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_3_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}We're facing a huge horde of Gargantuars, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_3_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}I suggest that we bring out the Tier 3 Citron.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_3_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}His ability to nearly one-shot a Garg is nothing to scoff at.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_3_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}The power of concentrated orange juice, User Dave. And infused plasma.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_5_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}But they are frozen! Of all the eras how did they get frozen during the Beach?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_5_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}Beats me. I'm a time machine and even I can't deal with time shenanigans sometimes.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_6_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}I'm not pleased with you using my zombies as dummies for target practice.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_6_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}Hence, time to turn the tables. NOW your plants will be my zombie's targets.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_6_INTRO_4: {SAY:zombossicon}My 特点 zombie that has the power I harnessed from your plant will surely ensure my total victory.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_6_INTRO_8: {SAY:crazydave}Don't be scared! What can he do with a ton of plasma and orange juice anyway?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_6_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}I think that's enough power to last me a good while!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_6_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Agreed. I think we can conclude the training for now.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CITRON_6_OUTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}Back to time travelling we go! Where are we going next?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_1_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}My sensors have detected another new plant, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_1_INTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}More plants! More friends! What do we have this time?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_1_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}He can provide a power boost to those in the Shadow Families.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_1_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}Ah, no. The boost Moonflower provides to her collaborators.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_1_INTRO_7: {SAY:winnie}We'll need to fight our way through the dark City to retrieve him.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_3_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Something tells me something may sneak in this time...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_3_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}Better not be them - I hate them.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_5_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}We're once again in a locked coordinate in time.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_5_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}However, the plants we have... shadow family without Moonflower.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_7_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Welcome, Gardening Adventurers, to another one of my attacks.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_7_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}However, this one will not be normal, for I have called upon zombies from other timelines.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_7_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}My state-of-the-art portals will aid them during the attack as well.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_7_INTRO_4: {SAY:zombossicon}Good luck, Protectors. Let's see how far you can go before inevitably surrendering your brains.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_7_INTRO_7: {SAY:winnie}My data suggest that Kiwibeast will arrive to temporarily aid us.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_7_INTRO_8: {SAY:winnie}He may be small and cute, but once damaged enough, he will go super angry.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_7_INTRO_9: {SAY:winnie}Then he can deal damage to ALL zombies on screen!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_7_INTRO_1: {SAY:winnie}Protecting him will be quite useful against the zombie horde... both expected and not.
{SAY:winnie}We already have the僵尸 Parrots to deal with, User Dave.
{SAY:winnie}It's unlikely that Zomboss will need Bungee僵尸again.
{SAY:crazydave}Oh. Right. I just really hate being Dave-napped!
{NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}Do not use Thyme Warp on a zombie being dragged by Grimrose.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_10_INTRO_: {SAY:zombossicon}If I cannot have the temple's secret, I shall plunge both you and it into darkness instead.
{SAY:zombossicon}Darkness... and a lot of portals that lead to Dark Ages.
{SAY:zombossicon}Then, we will publish, and you will perish!
{NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}A massive attack is on the horizon, User Dave.
{SAY:winnie}Should we succeed, we'll recover our shadowy friend.
{SAY:crazydave}A dark battle to retrieve our dark plant... fitting!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SHADOWLEAF_10_OUTRO_: {START_DIALOG_MUSIC}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}We did it! We foiled Mr. Boss guy again!
{SAY:crazydave}Now help me with the tea preparation, Penny. We must make Shadow Leaf feel welcome!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_1_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The night worlds seem to be much harsher, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_1_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}We need more allies. That's why we're here today.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_1_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}So we can search for Mr. Boss guy quicker?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_1_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}Yes. But we need to defend against zombies better first.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_1_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}My sensor indicates that the Ice-shroom has been lost in time for a long while...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_1_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}... but now we found him, in Jurassic Marsh. He only appears at night, though.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_1_INTRO_7: {SAY:winnie}We'll need to get through these zombies first before we can even start searching.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_1_INTRO_8: {SAY:crazydave}Day or night, those devolved caveman zombies are no match for our modern plants!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_2_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Uh oh... other zombies have joined the fight this time...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_2_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}We'll need to be on high alert this time.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_4_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}We haven't found his seed packets, though.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_4_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}In the meantime, he has agreed to help us defend against the zombies.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_4_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}We're gonna have a great time with his cool power!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_9_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The Nether Dodo has been quite a pain so far.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_9_INTRO_2: {EXCITED:winnie}I believe that some payback is due.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_9_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}And what's better than turning it against the zombies?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_9_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}A deadly, unstoppable zombie against the horde... who's gonna win?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_10_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}Excuse me while I go ahead and catch some of these to bring them home!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_10_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}{SAY:winnie}We did it! Ice-shroom has been fully recovered - permanently now.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_10_OUTRO_2: {EXCITED:crazydave}And I got myself a couple of these lightly bugs! Win-win!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ICESHROOM_10_OUTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}We're done with the Quest for now... time to head back.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_1_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}This time, Sun Bean wished to be understood. And so another training course is in order.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_1_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}You'll need to utilize his power to win these challenges.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_1_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}The power of the sun, packed in a small bean! CRAZZYYYY!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_1_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}We went WAY past that a long time ago, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_3_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Sun is going to be scarce this time.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_3_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Most of our sun producing plants have decided to take a break.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_3_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}Not all hope is lost yet. Perhaps those Kings will come in handy... in one way or another.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_3_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}Oh! Maybe they'll knight me so I will be protected from zombies! Great idea, Penny!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_4_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Now even Sun Bean has gone AWOL.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_4_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Those 6 on the lawn are what we have for this level.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_4_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}When tough times arise, who's gonna answer the call?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_4_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}Reinforcement will come when we least expect.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_4_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}... does that mean I should make mints into plants?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_4_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}... that sounds like a bad idea and a disappoint-mint to me.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_4_INTRO_7: {SAY:crazydave}But think about it, Penny! They might be the breath of fresh air we need!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_6_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The night has come down, yet Sun Bean's still here.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_6_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}It'll be a sitting plant against the final attack... unless we protect it!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_6_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}Let's stand our ground and save it!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_6_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}{SAY:winnie}That's the end of the challenges. We have prevailed!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_6_OUTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}We now have an even better bean!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SUNBEAN_6_OUTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}And no half-baked zombie attack can hold us back from that!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BANANA_1_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The Banana Launcher wishes to challenge us this time, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BANANA_1_INTRO_2: {特点2:crazydave}That trickster? Challenge? This will be CRAZYYYYYYY!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BANANA_1_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Indeed. These levels will be quite tricky to deal with.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BANANA_1_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}We'll need to use him to our advantage to win.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BANANA_1_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}Be as slippery as the banana! That's smart, Penny!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BANANA_1_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}... that's actually profound, User Dave. Points for that.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BANANA_3_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The zombies are preparing a heavy assault in Far Future...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BANANA_3_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Since you still haven't earned your plant picking privilege back...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BANANA_3_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}... I'm picking this time. Hopefully this team will be enough.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BANANA_3_INTRO_4: {TIRED:crazydave}When will I earn it back then?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BANANA_4_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}We have returned to the darkest era...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BANANA_4_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Seems like another challenge from the Banana.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BANANA_4_INTRO_7: {NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}NOT THAT KIND OF CLEA... damn it.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BANANA_6_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Guuureetings! Zomboss be back with another trick with help from Banana.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BANANA_6_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}Ice floes? Move zombies outta the lawn!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BANANA_6_INTRO_4: {SAY:zombossicon}Simple plans be best plans! Brains? Ours!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BANANA_6_INTRO_7: {SAY:crazydave}We just need to outsmart Mr. Boss guy once more! How hard can it be?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BANANA_6_OUTRO_1: {START_DIALOG_MUSIC}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}That's enough trickery for one trip, I think.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BANANA_6_OUTRO_3: {特点2:crazydave}I get to know more about our CRAZYYYYYYY Banana! Nice!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_BANANA_6_OUTRO_4: {NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}Lord help us all with these two crazies...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_1_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Oh no... Spring Bean has gone crazy!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_1_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Worse! He has gone ahead and crafted a whole quest about him!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_1_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}This is not a joke, User Dave. I fear these challenges will be unlike anything we have faced.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_1_INTRO_6: {SAY:crazydave}How hard can a plant quest be?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_3_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}... your plant has the same terrible plant picking skill as you.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_3_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}Crazy genes running in both me and my plants?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_3_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}*robotic sigh* This... is gonna be quite a dilemma.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_5_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Finally... we seem to get a break.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_5_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Break all the iceblocks in time... seems simple enough.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_5_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}Well... and ice pushers too! Can't forget them.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_6_INTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}Yikes! That's a LOT of flower lines!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_6_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Indeed... where did he even get the time to grow this many flowers?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_6_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}... we're talking about time travel here, aren't we?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_7_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}I don't think we'll like this next one...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_7_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}This is a very big restriction, after all.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_7_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}There must be something more into this! How else will we beat this?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_8_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}Hey there moldies! Part of Spring Bean's challenge, huh?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_8_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}I'm sure it can't be worse than previous battles.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_8_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Can we retrain your plants to be less crazy?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_8_OUTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}It takes a 特点 kind of crazy to be this good at puzzles!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_8_OUTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}Anddddd we've lost him. Let's just get outta here.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_SPRINGBEAN_8_OUTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}Pretty sure our neighbor here will share the same sentiment.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_1_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}User Dave, seems like our detour has taken us back to the beginning.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_1_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}Great! ... do you think I can eat the one Taco that I ate again?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_1_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}There are more pressing matters than that, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_1_INTRO_6: {SAY:crazydave}Ah... I miss the good old days. Just our friendly neighborhood zombies!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_2_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The zombie attack seems to be stretched out into night time.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_2_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Fortunately we get some leftover sun from defending the day.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_2_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}Night time, party time! We even have a few stuff leftover from our summer break!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_2_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}So long as you make an attempt to kill the zombies... as usual.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_7_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Cleopatra僵尸have stumbled into this era, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_7_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}They can summon zombies with their... unique dance moves.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_7_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}Bah! Cheap imitation of our good old Dancing僵尸.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_7_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}You should have seen his disco-tastic moves!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_9_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The final day of our mini adventure.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_9_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}My data analysis suggests that this will be a MASSIVE attack.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_9_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}Let's just say... we are gonna have quite some BIG problems.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_9_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}We have been through quite a lot already! How bad can this even be?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_10_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}And yet, we have emerged victorious... as usual.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_10_OUTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}Speaking of whom... we should go back to chase him now.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_10_OUTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}Good bye once more, my beloved neighborhood!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_MODERN_10_OUTRO_6: {SAY:crazydave}We'll come back soon for more good old days!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_WINTERMELON_1_INTRO_: {SAY:zombossicon}I have chosen to launch a massive small-scale invasion across all timelines, once again.
{SAY:zombossicon}Try to stop me... if you dare.
{NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Seems like we're gonna need to bring out the big plants.
{SAY:winnie}I suggest that we make use of the Melon brothers' immense firepower.
{SAY:crazydave}Great idea, Penny! Their seedy melons will surely destroy any zombies easily!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_WINTERMELON_4_INTRO_: {SAY:zombossicon}Did you enjoy the puzzle I made?
{SAY:zombossicon}Well, no matter what your answer is, I have prepared another for you.
{SAY:zombossicon}My machines have temporarily disabled nearly all your plants... again...
{SAY:zombossicon}Will you survive? I sure hope not.
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}That was one fine sandwich! What did I miss?
{SAY:winnie}Dr. Zomboss being... well, Dr. Zomboss. So not much.
{SAY:crazydave}Well then, time to continue with the zombie bashing!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_WINTERMELON_6_INTRO_: {SAY:zombossicon}Looks like you're about to foil my plans once again.
{SAY:zombossicon}I have no choice but to send more Gargantuars to end your little travelling scheme.
{SAY:zombossicon}Farewell, my nemesis. Sincerely, Dr. Edgar Zomboss
{SAY:winnie}I can send in some help this time, but I'll need time to get ready for that.
{SAY:crazydave}Try to hold them off while Penny sets up her timey help!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_WINTERMELON_6_OUTRO_: {SAY:zombossicon}That was awkward, to say the least.
{SAY:zombossicon}But, I have confidence that my next scheme will destroy you.
{SAY:zombossicon}For now, I shall retreat. Enjoy your victory. Sincerely, Dr. Edgar Zomboss
{SAY:winnie}Only the battle, User Dave. Not the war.
{SAY:crazydave}That's still grounds for celebration - thanks to our melony friends!
{SAY:crazydave}We must have... cake! Time to hit the kitchen!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CRYSTALLSHROOM_1_INT: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Wowzers! This is 4000 years ago... now at nighttime! Again!
{SAY:winnie}Correct, User Dave. My sensors detect something 特点 around here...
{SAY:winnie}Though I'm quite unsure what it is.
{SAY:winnie}For now we should take a look around... at the incoming zombie horde.
{SAY:winnie}We can never escape from the zombies, it seems.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CRYSTALLSHROOM_2_INT: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Alert, User Dave! My sensors detect an abnormal amount of sandstorms!
{SAY:crazydave}Should I be worried about more dust in my eyes?
{SAY:winnie}Even worse, these sandstorms are also abnormal as well!
{SAY:crazydave}We'd better keep our eyes on them, then!
{SAY:crazydave}... preferably without getting dust in our eyes of course.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CRYSTALLSHROOM_4_INT: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Ah, it seems like we have found another new plant here.
{SAY:winnie}The rare Crystall-shroom will fire a chilling crystal that can pierce through all zombies.
{SAY:winnie}We must escort her throughout our stay here in order to obtain her for our arsenal.
{SAY:winnie}... that's the best you can do?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CRYSTALLSHROOM_6_INT: {SAY:zombossicon}It seems that you seek to obtain our crystal technology.
{SAY:zombossicon}No matter! Prepare for trouble, as I make it double!
{SAY:zombossicon}Good luck, Protectors. Regards, Dr. Edgar Zomboss
{SAY:crazydave}Our plant, made with Mr. Boss guy's technology?
{SAY:winnie}We may need more time to investigate this... predicament.
{SAY:winnie}For now, we have zombies and storms to defend from.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CRYSTALLSHROOM_7_INT: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}I can feel this burning sense of incoming dread...
{SAY:winnie}I'm not quite sure... perhaps it is because of the previous ordeal?
{SAY:crazydave}No. Must be something I eat, then.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CRYSTALLSHROOM_10_IN: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Welcome, Desert Dwellers, to one of my deadliest attacks.
{SAY:zombossicon}While you were busy contemplating my lie, I have taken all of the crystal power from your plant already.
{SAY:zombossicon}Now perish, as I whittle away your defense bits by bits!
{SAY:zombossicon}Resistance is simply futile. Sincerely, Dr. Edgar Zomboss
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_CRYSTALLSHROOM_10_OU: {START_DIALOG_MUSIC}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Mr. Boss guy has been defeated again!
{SAY:winnie}Defeating that BOSS zombie has returned Crystall-shroom her full power, User Dave.
{SAY:winnie}She can now join our quest to stop Dr. Zomboss once and for all.
{SAY:crazydave}What a ride! So long, Ancient Egypt!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ELECTRICBLUEBERRY_1_: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}It looks like we are here to learn more about the plants we have.
{SAY:winnie}Electric Blueberry is here to assist us through the upcoming challenges.
{SAY:winnie}He can deliver thunderstorms that zap zombies to death.
{SAY:winnie}He also will specifically target 特点 zombies first, and Gargantuars last.
{SAY:crazydave}This guy is buzzing with energy, Penny! Let's welcome him with open arms then!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ELECTRICBLUEBERRY_3_: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Hey! Looks like there is going to be a flying party over there!
{SAY:winnie}Starfruit and Spikeweed might be inadequate choices to deal with this alone, however.
{SAY:crazydave}No problemo! Electric Blueberry will light the zombies up!
{SAY:crazydave}Time to make this party shine even more, Penny!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_EPICQUEST_ELECTRICBLUEBERRY_6_: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}We have arrived at the last challenge.
{SAY:winnie}A huge hoarde of Gargantuars are coming to attack.
{SAY:winnie}Remember that Electric Blueberries target Gargantuars last.
{SAY:crazydave}Assist these endangered fellows then! Ensure they have a bright future!
{SAY:winnie}*robotic sigh* Why must you torture us with puns?
{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}{SAY:winnie}We have achieved a victory, User Dave.
{SAY:crazydave}Thanks to these little guys - they pack a LOT of power!
{SAY:winnie}Indeed, User Dave. This have been enlightening to all of us.
{SAY:crazydave}Wowzers, Penny! You have embraced the fun of puns!
{SAY:winnie}*robotic sigh* It appears that I have.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE1_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}The Future! Do you think we'll see future-Dave as well?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE1_INTRO_2: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}After all, it's 4000 years! I'm sure he'll survive in his robotic glory!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE1_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}I'm detecting a sudden influx of power.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE1_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}Perhaps future technology has allowed the zombies to have access to portals.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE1_INTRO_7: {SAY:crazydave}Portals? More CRAAAAY-ziness! These zombies are persistent, aren't they?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE2_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Spider Bots are coming down on our defense!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE2_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}They are tougher than the average Imps too!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE2_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}Get my swatter and my shoes then - we're going on a spider hunt!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE5_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Mechs seem to be a common theme in the Far Future.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE5_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Be prepared - they might be even tougher than most Gargantuars.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE5_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}Better bust out our best offensive plants then!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE5_INTRO_5: {特点2:crazydave}After all, the best offense is a good defense... and we need to strike back somehow!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE6_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}In this year your brains were collected ages ago.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE6_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}Collect them again soon, Dr. Edgar Zomboss.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE6_INTRO_4: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}Watch out neighbor, I'm pretty sure he wasn't talking about my BRAINS!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE6_INTRO_5: {PLAYFUL:winnie}I would say there's evidence to the contrary.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE9_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}So far these zombies have been unsuccessful with invading using portals.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE9_INTRO_2: {TIRED:winnie}But it seems like the zombies are going to ramp up their portal 用法 now. Stay on high alert!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE9_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}They aren't the old portals we have back home right? We'll beat them just fine!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE10_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}You can decide to launch one mower early now.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE10_INTRO_2: {EXCITED:winnie}Just press and hold a mower when the time is right.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE10_INTRO_3: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Sometimes that's the most strate-logical thing to do!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE10_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}Indeed. E特点ly for these hordes of mechs.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE10_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}{SAY:crazydave}Whew! That was one heck of a giant wave of machines!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE10_OUTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}My sensors have detected another era worth visiting.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE10_OUTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}Then what are we waiting for? Let's go!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE11_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}The future's not what it used to be! There's more of it!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE11_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}I believe zombies may be drawing strength from the time fissure, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE11_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}We will likely encounter more powerful zombies.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE11_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}Thankfully, I have detected a new solution: Power Tiles.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE11_INTRO_7: {SAY:winnie}If you use a Plant Food on a plant on a tile...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE11_INTRO_8: {SAY:winnie}All plants on the tiles of the same color will also receive a Plant Food.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE11_INTRO_9: {SAY:winnie}You may want to maximize the use of these tiles in order to win.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE11_INTRO_10: {SAY:crazydave}Multiplying the number of Plant Food effects?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE13_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}I hear music! Time to dance, right?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE13_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Are we to believe that the zombies may use the power of dance?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE14_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}I used to hypnotize the old Dancing僵尸 back at night.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE14_INTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}Then we could dance together with his crew while defeating the other zombies!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE14_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}Those were the good old days. Or nights.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE14_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}Be prepared to relive the past, User Dave. Right here in the future.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE16_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Speaking of the old night, there's also Football僵尸 as well!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE16_INTRO_2: {SAY:crazydave}Do you think we'll see a version of him, somewhere around here?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE16_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}Aw. He was fun to watch football with!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE16_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}Granted, he only spoke NO BRAINZ when hypnotized, but still!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE17_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The zombies have developed a new technological invention to fight us, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE17_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}These runes will prevent us from planting ground plants on them.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE17_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Not only that - once activated, they will shield all zombies on those tiles.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE17_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}We'll need to be careful around them - I fear that this shielding will be impossible to break through.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE17_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}Think of the horror Penny - a shielded Shield僵尸! How will we even win?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE17_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}I'm afraid I don't have a good answer for this.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE20_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}I detect a massive shift in time, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE20_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Frozen Thyme Warps placed on our lawn seem to be the cause.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE20_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}Thyme Warps will warp all zombies back to the start while restoring all their health.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE20_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}Who cares? We have one final wave of zombies to bash!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE20_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}{SAY:winnie}We'll need to keep an eye on Thyme Warp.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE20_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}His overwhelming power can be a game changer for our side.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE20_OUTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}I strongly suspect he had already set up something ahead of us...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE20_OUTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}Ah well. We didn't get what we came for though. You know what to do, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE20_OUTRO_9: {SAY:crazydave}Then time to hit the time stream, Penny!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}Isn't it convenient that your neighbor is so helpful in your fight against us zombies?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_2: {SAY:zombossicon}Crazy David's apparent incompetence is only eclipsed by his usefulness.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_3: {SAY:zombossicon}However, with one secret word my sleeper agent will turn against you.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_INTRO_ZOMBOSS_6: {PLAYFUL}Can I borrow your brains? Um, I mean hot sauce!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_MAGNIFYING_GRASS_FAILUR: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY}Oops, you should give it another shot!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}I spy with my crazy eye a U.F.B.! An unidentified flying brain!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_2: {SAY:winnie}Something more formidable than a brain lies within.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_2: {EXCITED:crazydave}I want to eat THAT hypno-taco again! I need my TIME MACHINE!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_OUTRO_ZOMBOSS_3: {TIRED:crazydave}What? Wait a minute... what was I saying again?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_ZOMBIENOTE_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{SAY}It says there's an error. Can you come here and fix it Penny?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_FUTURE_ZOMBIENOTE_2: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{TIRED}Did you try unplugging it and plugging it back in?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_GATE_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:crazydave}Woah! What's this? It's blocking our path!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_GATE_INTRO_2: {EXCITED:winnie}We may need to find another way to bypass this.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_GATE_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:winnie}Perhaps we can come back after we're done with other eras?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_GATE_INTRO_4: {EXCITED:winnie}We may use Travel Log for checkpoints in our adventure.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE1_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{PLAYFUL:crazydave}Brrrrr. It's colder than a polar bear eating an ice pop!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE1_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Indeed. It appears we have arrived in the Frostbite Caves.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE1_INTRO_3: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}We've traveled so far back in history ... we've arrived in PREhistory!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE1_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}A historic moment indeed, User Dave. But more importantly...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE1_INTRO_5: {EXCITED:winnie}My sensors indicate there is an ice floe on the lawn.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE1_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}Data suggests it will block both plants and zombies.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE1_INTRO_7: {EXCITED:winnie}Though I predict hungry zombies will find a way around it.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE1_INTRO_8: {SAY:crazydave}Don't worry. We'll plant wisely and stop those zombies COLD!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE2_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}Don't look now, Penny, but those plants have a bad case of freezer burn!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE2_INTRO_2: {TIRED:winnie}It's the freezing winds from this time period. They've immobilized the plants.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE2_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:winnie}I suggest we call on Hot Potato. She can melt those ice blocks.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE2_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}I'm warming up to the idea already!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE5_INTRO_2: {TIRED:winnie}Brrrr... w-w-w-we may be encountering s-s-s-snowstorms soon.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE5_INTRO_3: {TIRED:winnie}I s-s-s-suspect that these zombies m-m-m-may use them to their adv... ACCCHEW!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE6_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}Me Zomboss. Me write you another threatening note.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE6_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}You in trouble. Biiiiig trouble. Gargantuan trouble, in fact!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE6_INTRO_3: {SAY:zombossicon}Sloth Gargantuar smash! Smash your tiny, shivering plants!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE6_INTRO_4: {SAY:zombossicon}Sloth Gargantuar deliver prehistoric plague of Imps!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE6_INTRO_6: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}I postulate evolution will never come to that zombie.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE6_INTRO_7: {SAY:crazydave}Not in a million, billion, gazillion years.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE9_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}These endangered plants are so far away... this is nigh-impossible!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE9_INTRO_2: {TIRED:winnie}The solution might be more obscure than we thought.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE10_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}I'm gettin' dizzy from all these zombie-moving sliders!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE10_INTRO_2: {TIRED:winnie}And it will only g-g-get worse. We got company!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE10_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}Do they come to buy my plants?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE10_OUTRO_2: {TIRED:crazydave}They just won't take no brains for an answer!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE10_OUTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}According to my data, Neanderthal zombie skulls are 33.2 percent harder than other zombie skulls.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE10_OUTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}Ah well. At least we survived. Let's get outta here!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE11_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Brrr... I can never g-g-get used to the cold.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE11_INTRO_2: {TIRED:winnie}Or why you seem to be fine in that attire.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE11_INTRO_4: {TIRED:crazydave}What I DO know... is that we have more zombies to defeat!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE11_INTRO_5: {TIRED:crazydave}Regardless of the cold... Or the cold comfort of victory!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE12_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}Would it b-b-be too far-fetched to say that only a lava floor can warm me up?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE12_INTRO_2: {TIRED:crazydave}Don't worry Penny! We have lots of fire plants from the conveyor this time!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE12_INTRO_4: {TIRED:crazydave}No problem! Someone has to combat the cold for you!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE15_INTRO_6: {TIRED:winnie}The Nether Dodos are a force to be reckoned with.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE15_INTRO_7: {TIRED:winnie}They CANNOT be detected unless they fly.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE15_INTRO_8: {EXCITED:crazydave}Can we keep one and train her how to fly then?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE15_INTRO_9: {TIRED:winnie}No. We do need to find a way to force them to fly though.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE15_INTRO_10: {EXCITED:crazydave}Don't worry! I'm sure our neighbor can figure something out with these plants!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE15_INTRO_11: {NPC_EXIT:crazydave}{TIRED:winnie}NO WAIT, WE DON'T HAVE ANY WARM...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE15_INTRO_15: {TIRED:winnie}Try to find a way around the freezing wind, then.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE15_OUTRO_5: {TIRED:winnie}That won't work on me this time.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE17_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}... seems like the c-c-cold's getting to me and my memory.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE17_INTRO_4: {TIRED:winnie}But, your mold colonies have managed to create an interesting challenge this time.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE17_INTRO_5: {TIRED:crazydave}We don't want to hurt Moldies... but we need to plant on those lanes!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE18_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}That's a lot of ice right there.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE18_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}And now I scream for icecream, because only it will melt my frozen heart!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE18_INTRO_5: {TIRED:winnie}Icy a lot more, t-t-too. Future zombies have arrived in the past.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE18_INTRO_6: {特点2:crazydave}A technological advancement in Frostbite Caves? ABSURD!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE20_INTRO_2: {SAY:zombossicon}Zomboss blows up mines... Mines perish... Then you die!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE20_INTRO_4: {NPC_EXIT:zombossicon}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:crazydave}You heard that Penny! We have to protect them!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE20_INTRO_5: {TIRED:crazydave}Not because I want to know their secret lives!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE20_OUTRO_2: {TIRED:winnie}And it will just get worse from here.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE20_OUTRO_3: {TIRED:winnie}The toughest challenges are far from over.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE20_OUTRO_4: {TIRED:winnie}For now we can leave this place. Go to somewhere warmer.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE20_OUTRO_5: {TIRED:winnie}Like Wild West... there's another energy spike from there.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE20_OUTRO_6: {EXCITED:crazydave}Another chance to finally face Dr. Zomboss? Well then, let's time travel!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED: winnie}User Dave, I've detected an incoming ice cube.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_3: {SAY:winnie}Analysis suggests this creepy cube unlocks a chilly challenge.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_OUTRO_DANGER_ROOM_KEY_4: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}You know what I say? Brrrrr-ing it on!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_ZOMBIENOTE_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{TIRED:crazydaveicon}Penny, hath you ever tried licking an ice-thickle and got your tongue thtuck to it?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_ZOMBIENOTE_3: {SAY:crazydaveicon}Uh ... me neither. Thath would be craaaazthy.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_ZOMBIENOTE_4: {SAY:winnieicon}Sigh. While your tongue heals, please note the strange stone tablet.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_ZOMBIENOTE_5: {SAY:winnieicon}It appears to be a warning sign, written in Cave僵尸.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_ICEAGE_ZOMBIENOTE_6: {PLAYFUL:crazydaveicon}Doesth it warn people not to lick ice-thickles?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_BIG_REWARD_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}You are truly amazing! Most deserving of the name... Senor Pinata!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_BIG_REWARD_INTRO_2: {PLAYFUL:crazydave}Have you seen my taco Senor Pinata? It was about this big...
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_BIG_REWARD_INTRO_3: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED}That's it. Please disrupt this anomaly before User Dave gets too attached.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_LEVEL_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED}User Dave, this does not look like a party.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_LEVEL_INTRO_2: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{PLAYFUL}It could still be a surprise party, with gifts and everything!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_LEVEL_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}You'll see Penny, I think these zombies are different.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_MAP_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}{EXCITED}There is an impending attack on your house in modern times!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_MAP_INTRO_2: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{EXCITED}I bet it's not an attack... I bet it's a party! Oh, I hope it's a Pinata Party!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_MAP_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnieicon}It's not a party, there are zombies from all different time periods ready to strike!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_MAP_INTRO_4: {EXCITED:winnieicon}Who knows what else they could have brought with them?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_MAP_INTRO_5: {PLAYFUL:crazydaveicon}Sounds like a party to me! Better hurry up, we don't want to miss out!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_MAP_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}The party is over for now, but those zombies will be back some day.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_MAP_OUTRO_3: {SAY:winnieicon}Defending against multiple parties in a row could lead to a massive pinata anomaly.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_MAP_OUTRO_4: {EXCITED:crazydaveicon}I can't wait for the next Pinata Party, and the one after that!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_MAP_OUTRO_5: {TIRED:crazydaveicon}But those pinatas just remind me of my sad lost taco. Let's go!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_RESET_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnieicon}Missing a Pinata Party will reset the build up to the massive pinata anomaly.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_RESET_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnieicon}I won't pretend to understand why, but the data does not lie.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_RESET_INTRO_3: {NPC_ENTER:crazydaveicon}{EXCITED}Just let us know of any more Pinata Parties you detect!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_RESET_INTRO_4: {PLAYFUL:crazydaveicon}For a party they can be pretty sneaky.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_REWARD_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}What did I tell you Penny? A surprise Pinata Party!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_REWARD_INTRO_2: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED}Does not compute. It appears a level 3 diagnostic check is in order.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOD_REWARD_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}Pinatas! Let's bust some open and see what we get!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT1_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}The City at night... it is quite a sight.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT1_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}However, zombies are still here. They think that attacking at night is easier.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT1_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}The mystery of the temple must be protected from these shuffling adventurers.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT1_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}Well then, time to deliver a whooping butt kick to these undeads!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT3_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{EXCITED:winnie}Sun is scarce as Gold Tiles haven't appeared.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT3_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}We'll need to produce more to survive the night.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT3_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}Are you sure it's not because The National Plant Organization asked us to do so?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT5_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{TIRED:winnie}These sneaky undeads have found a new way to fight against us.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT5_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}... that would have been more realistic, but no.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT5_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}They will try harder to steal our sun though - so be quick.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT5_INTRO_5: {SAY:crazydave}Those no-good sun stealing zombies! We'll show them who's the fastest!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT5_INTRO_6: {SAY:winnie}... we're not in the West, User Dave.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT5_INTRO_7: {SAY:crazydave}Details, details! We got zombies to defeat, so who cares?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT6_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}The hunt for the sun has begun.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT8_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}Do you think we'll ever succeed in stopping Mr. Boss guy?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT8_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}... it's strange that a time machine doesn't have answers to time-related questions, huh.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT8_INTRO_6: {SAY:crazydave}But we're literally surfing in the time stream!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT10_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{START_DIALOG_MUSIC}{SAY:winnie}And so peace has returned to the quiet jungle night.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT10_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Time to hop back to the space-time continuum.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY_NIGHT10_OUTRO_4: {EXCITED:winnie}Cheer up, User Dave. Don't be so meta and gloomy like Gloom-shroom.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY1_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}戴夫, 这不是一般的丛林.仪器数据显示, 这是传说中的失落之城.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY1_INTRO_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}失落之城?潘妮! 我们找到它了!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY1_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}除了失落之城, 我还能在哪里找到我丢失的平底锅?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY1_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}你一直在公然反抗所有的逻辑学理论, 戴夫.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY2_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}仪器数据显示,上面传来了某种活动的信号.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY2_INTRO_2: {EXCITED:crazydave}也许这是一个老天爷的馈赠吧!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY2_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}从统计学的角度来说, 你说的那件事的可能性简直就是无稽之谈.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY2_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}我相信这是一个新的僵尸威胁. 我们应该对那些意料之外的的客人留心防御.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY3_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{PLAYFUL}这是第一个坚不可摧.未来还会有更多的坚不可摧.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY3_OUTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}戴夫, 仪器数据显示,时间开始弯曲.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY3_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}某些时代的僵尸可能会在别的时代里出现.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY3_OUTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}从现在起我们必须要更加小心.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY3_OUTRO_4: {EXCITED:crazydave}谁会在意呢? 我很疯~~狂~~ 向前进!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY5_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}我们将会有一场艰苦的战斗.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY5_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}我们不仅没有什么植物可以选择, 而且能够种植植物的数量也很有限.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY5_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}对快速僵尸快速处理, 我们会渡过难关.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY6_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{NPC_ENTER:winnie}{SAY:winnie}历史文献表明,这里的人崇尚太阳, 阳光应该充足.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY6_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}我建议我们在那些金色的砖上种植植物.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY6_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}只要上面有植物, 它们就应该会不断地产生阳光.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY6_INTRO_4: {NPC_ENTER:zombossicon}{SAY:zombossicon}很抱歉打断你的探险, 失落之城的冒险者.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY6_INTRO_5: {SAY:zombossicon}告诉你一个不幸的消息, 失落巨人僵尸正打算在今天毁灭你们.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY6_INTRO_6: {SAY:zombossicon}准备好你的脑子, 成为古老的历史吧!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY6_INTRO_9: {SAY:winnie}我们稍后会追上他-巨大的问题即将到来!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY8_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:winnie}今天的黄金浓度似乎要高得多.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY8_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}黄金砖将会时不时的产生, 如果他们能产生的话.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY8_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}我们将会变得十分富有!... 但是它们为什么会产生?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY8_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}丛林中蕴藏着许多秘密, 戴夫. 我们最好不要质疑它.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY9_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}您可能会发现您错过的有关植物和僵尸的某些细节.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY9_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}... 免得你想当然代入原版.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY10_OUTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}失落之城将完好无损.没有僵尸会发现它.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY10_OUTRO_3: {EXCITED:crazydave}是时候进入下一个时代了! 会是怎么样的呢?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY11_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Back to the jungle! Looking as lost as ever!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY11_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}Be careful of the stronger adventuring zombies, though.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY11_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}THEY should be careful of the plants instead!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY11_INTRO_4: {SAY:crazydave}After all, exploring the jungle can be dangerous!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY14_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Do you think I can convey my thoughts to Mr. Boss guy?
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY14_INTRO_2: {SAY:winnie}I somehow doubt that, User Dave. For now, we have a conveyor challenge ahead.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY14_INTRO_3: {SAY:crazydave}Good enough for me! I'll just send my notes on this!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY14_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}Sadly, we can't. Hopefully we can configure this conveyor to be two ways, one day.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY14_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}For now, we'll just have to settle with plants delivered towards us from the unknown.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY16_INTRO_1: {NPC_ENTER:winnie}{NPC_ENTER:crazydave}{SAY:crazydave}Ouchie! The jungle sure has a lot of bugs!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY16_INTRO_3: {SAY:winnie}I have detected the presence of some unique trap tiles on the lawn.
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY16_INTRO_4: {SAY:winnie}When triggered by a plant or a zombie, a swarm of bugs will appear to bite both!
LocStringValues.NARRATIVE_LOSTCITY16_INTRO_5: {SAY:winnie}You'll probably need some strong defensive plants to protect other plants from the bugs...
